title: Premiere插件：360°VR三维全景转场特效插件 Mettle SkyBox 360/VR Transitions Packs 1&2 v1.17
author: 大众脸
content: Mettle SkyBox 360/VR Transitions Packs 1&2 v1.17 是一款专为 Adobe Premiere Pro 设计的 360°VR 转场特效插件，支持在视频中添加电影级的 360°/VR 转场效果，如放射光线、色彩溢出、光晕光斑、球形模糊等。该插件支持等距圆柱投影格式（Equirectangular），适用于单声道 2:1 或立体声 1:1 上下排列的 360° 视频素材。操作简单，采用拖放式安装，可直接在 Premiere Pro 的视频转场菜单中使用。

download_links.name: Premiere插件：360°VR三维全景转场特效插件 Mettle SkyBox 360/VR Transitions Packs 1&2 v1.17

other.product_description: Stunning 360° Transitions. Add a cinematic look to your 360/VR Premiere Pro productions: Light Rays, Chroma Leaks, Light Leaks, Spherical Blurs • Drag-and-drop seamless 360 transitions for editing 360 footage in Premiere Pro. • Easy to Customise – make them your own • Supports Equirectangular format, mono 2:1 or Stereo 1:1 over-under • Installs: Video Transitions > Mettle 360/VR
other.installation_note: 插件为一键安装版，安装即可使用，无功能限制
